The persistent blasts distorted your sense of reality to the point where you could feel yourself slipping into insanity. However, before the stench of Coach Hank's was able to drive you over the brink into insanity, Coach Ben called time.

You felt a rush of relief as Coach Hank lifted his massive, toned gluts off of your tainted face. For a few moments you remained on your back, gasping like a fish out of water for what was, comparatively, fresh air (Even though the collective musk and gas of the three godly coaches had long since ruined it). As you slowly recovered, a booming voice rang out throughout the room.

"Alright maggot, you know what happens now," boomed Coach Bruce.

"W-what?"

"Ughh YOUR PENALTY, DUMBASS, for not winning your match against Hank."

"oh.OH. Please don't I'm begging you, I need that book" you hopelessly begged

"Huh, tough luck, kid," coldly stated Coach as he unleashed a bombastic, nuclear bomb of a fart on your book.

"Noooo, Please! I can't watch," you said as your adverted your gaze.

"Well, guess what? You are gonna watch every second of it," said Coach Hank as he and Coach Ben quickly restrained you and forced you to look upon the carnage that your book was suffering at the hands of your sadistic coach.

Blast after ghastly blast were forces upon your book, permanently engraving it with the unmistakable stench of Coach Bruce; destroying any chance you had of being able to do your homework without being reminded of him. 'That was his plan all along, wasn't it?' you thought to yourself 'For me to have a permanent reminder of him. A permanent reminder of his power over me, of what he can do to me. But why?'

Tears began to form in your eyes, partially from the realization, partially from the stench of Coach Bruce's gas which had duly contaminated all of the air in the room.

"Oh look, he's crying. What a pathetic little baby. Are you gonna go run home and tell mommy? Oh boo hoo," taunted the Coaches, further destroying you.

"Hey runt, if you're crying now just watch this," taunted Coach Bruce as he took in a deep breath in anticipation. Suddenly, he blasted the biggest fart of the night which lasted as long as all of his previous farts put together. It was as if all of the farts he had blasted before had suddenly reentered his body and united in terms of volume, stench, and sound; only to be expelled as one collective mass. The shire force of the blast was enough to create a stiff breeze that could be felt radiating in all directions from under Coach Bruce's toned cheeks. Its sound was so deafening that you could hear your ears ringing and actually saw some dust falling from the ceiling. And the smell, the smell was so bad that it could have easily caused someone who hadn't been acclimated to it to faint. You began to think that it would never end as you began to, once again, lose consciousness. However, right before you did the unruly blast came to and end with a sudden squishy sound.

"fewww. That. was. what. a. real. man's. capable. of." panted out Coach Bruce "But that might have been a bit too much, even for me."

"Dude, that. was. awesome," chimed in Coach Hank.

"Yeah, man. That was the manliest fart I've seen in a while. You should really work on trying to make even bigger ones, though it might prove fatal to the students," said Coach Ben

"Yeah, you guys are right. You can never have too much of the single manliest thing a real man can do, blast gas like a cannon."

As their conversation waned on, you began to become fully awake and suddenly snapped to your senses. "Oh dang, is my book ok?!"

"Your book? Oh that's right. I had gotten so into it I had forgotten all about it," said Coach Bruce as he stood up to examine the damage. "It's not to bad on the surface, guess your lucky my farts didn't disintegrate it or something, huh?"

You couldn't even respond as Coach mad his way holding out your book. But, right before he handed it to you he suddenly pulled it back.

"You know, I'm not totally done with this yet."

You screamed as Coach Bruce suddenly ripped out a page of your book.

"Haven't you done enough?!" you exclaim only to be answered by your indifferent Coach plunging his hand with the paper into the back of his shorts.

"That last one got a bit wet towards the end. Gotta clean up somehow, am I right?"

That was it. That was the last straw. You couldn't react to what had just happened, you couldn't even feel in emotions about it. All of the torment had taken its toll on your psyche; you beyond being destroyed you were just, numb.

"You alright?" asked Coach Bruce as he unceremoniously places the page he ad just used to wipe his ass back in your book and closed it, smearing his mess on more pages.

You didn't respond.

"Eh, what do I care. You can let him go now, guys."

And with that, both muscular coached released you and allowed you to be on your way.
114132111.title: It's Coach Hank's Turn

1141321111.content:
Unceremoniously, you exited the locker room and were hit by an exhilarating blast of fresh air. The air was so clean and crisp, sweet even. It was in stark contrast to the air within the locker room, which wasn't the best in the first place, but at this point qualified as a full blown bio hazard. However, you remained trapped in a daze, seemingly unfazed by the drastic change in air quality that was making its way into your body, cleansing it of the toxins that had just been forced into it. You continued to walk through the empty halls of the school until you had made your way outside and had started to make your way home. The whole way home you kept your head down, still struggling to process what exactly had just happened but nonetheless reverting to our natural state of avoiding the shame of having to look someone in the eyes in your current state. A cool breeze encircled you, caring the ever lingering stench the three muscle-bound coaches had engraved onto your being into your surroundings, causing all creatures, even insects, to treat you like an exclusion zone around a nuclear disaster. People could smell you coming from miles away and therefore avoided you likewise, causing you to become an social outcast not only in school but in everyday public life as well. All the while, you didn't really notice as your brain had seemingly shut off all function that didn't pertain to getting home in futile attempt to keep you from suffering the pain of having to process what had happened but it was only delaying the inevitable.

Once home, you made an immediate beeline for the shower where you quickly tossed off your clothes, climbed in, and opened the tap. The cold water falling from the shower head was another exhilarating blast however, you were not without reaction to this blast as you suddenly collapsed onto the cold, hard shower floor. Your brain had delayed the inevitable long enough and had just opened the flood gates, allowing you to finally process the full scope of the day's events.

'W-why the fuck would they do that!?' you questioned yourself as the cold water ran over your teary face. 'Why me? Out of all the God forsaken people on the planet why me?'

Several minutes passed until your were able to regain your composure enough to finish showering. As you grabbed the soap and began to scrub you began to notice something, the smell wasn't going away. No matter how hard you scrubbed the smell didn't seem to diminish.

'Come on, come on please.' you pathetically begged. 'How is that even possible?! It's like it's fucking part of my skin now!'

Soon enough, you had used up all the soap and had become red all over from your persistent scrubbing but the stench stubbornly lingered. 'It's probably coming from my dirty clothes, best to get rid of those,' you convinced yourself, not totally wrong as your clothes were beyond any hope of being washed clean again and would probably end up ruining the washing machine.

'I'll just get rid of these, finish my homework, and go to bed. Then tomorrow, it'll be like nothing ever happened.' you told yourself in order to push through those final urges of breaking down again. And with that, you tossed your clothes into the fireplace and went to your room to start your homework.

As you sat down and opened your book bag a sudden horrid, yet familiar, scent hit you like a sucker punch. It was the book that Coach had ruined, fulfilling it's duty instilled by Coach to torment your throughout your studies. You weren't about to take it, however, and grabbed a piece of cloth to wrap around your nose. With that, you were able to finished your work (luckily avoiding the pages that Coach had ripped out) and turned in for a good night's sleep. Unfortunately, your sleep wasn't good for long as your improvised mask came off as you slept, allowing Coach's rancid stench to violate your nostrils. The stench wasn't strong enough to wake you but it was nonetheless able to destroy your pleasant dreams and replace them with horrid nightmares of Coach's torment.

*The Next Day*

You woke up in a cold, panicked sweat having just been awoken by an truly horrifying dream. 'God damn it! Why does he have to bother me in my dreams too? Can't I just get a rest!?' you thought as you tucked your head between your knees and began to cry.

Suddenly, you came to your senses and jerked your head towards the clock only to see that you were late. "Oh shit," you exclaim as you hurry to collect all of your things and leave your house. Lady Luck was not smiling upon you today as you realized what class you were late for, none other than the human skunk himself. Your mind raced as you arrived at school, 'Oh God, oh God what do I do!? I don't want to deal with anymore torture but I can't afford to be marked truant. He's already tormented me enough, hasn't he?' Before you could finish deliberating you had arrived at the entrance of the very sight where you had been utterly destroyed the day prior. With much hesitation you took a deep breath and opened the door.

Fortunately, everyone had already left the locker room and had made their way into the main gym. This allowed you more time to build yourself up in preparation of dealing with Coach Bruce. You were done changing into your gym clothes and began walking towards the main gym sooner than you had hopped, passing the spots of your previous torment on the way with stench still lingering.

Arriving at the main gym, you reached for the handle of the doors with a shaky hand and, with bated breath, pushed it open. Suddenly, everyone had stopped what they were doing and stared at you. You thought about running away but were stopped by a sudden booming voice.

"Well, well, well, isn't it the shitbag himself. Glad you decided to join us, now come over here for your punishment for being late," boldly stated Coach Bruce.

"No"

"Excuse me? Did I hear that right?" cockily questioned Coach.

"I said no." You had no idea what possessed you to stand up to your bully of a coach but you boldly, and foolishly stood your ground.

"C'mon ass wipe, don't make this harder than it has to be." said Coach with a tinge of anger in his voice.

"I've had enough of you always picking on me. You're always tormenting me, in class, at home, and in my sleep even! Why do you even do it? Is i-OOF" you were suddenly interrupted by your coach tackling you to the ground.

"So, you want to know why I do it, huh?" angrily stated Coach. "I'll tell you. It's because it's the divine duty of a superior being, such as myself, to put the inferior scum of the Earth in their place. You see, that's why my buddies and I became gym teachers, so we could identify the lowest of the low before they reached adulthood and start preparing them to serve us stronger, more intelligent, superior rulers of the world. That's why I do what I do. I'm performing a duty to society as a whole by crushing your spirit and getting you used to being subjugated like you were born to do. Crushing your dreams before you try to reach them and inevitably fail due to your inherited inferiority in order to prevent it from damaging the dreams of those who count, us more dominant humans. Your nothing but a parasite to society, nothing but a toy for us to play with. As for why I use the specific methods I use, that's because I don't value your life or your property anymore than a gym rag. That's why I wipe my sweat on you, fart on you and your stuff, and use your stuff to wipe my ass. Hope that got through your inferior skull, shitbag. As for your punishment...
1141321111.title: after

choices: Step inside his office...if you dare
1143.content: You tried to be a good student. You went to class, got all your work in on time, never talked back, and were basically the ideal pupil. However, one day that all changed in an instance when you made one stupid mistake which resulted in you getting into trouble for the first time in your life. Naturally, this meant that you had to make a dreaded trek to the disciplinary office to speak with the Assistant Principal of Athletics and Discipline. A no-nonsense type of man who's duly hardened from his time as a military drill instructor. He demands nothing but the upmost respect from every student with anyone who breaks out of line receiving a swift and harsh punishment. Now, it was your time to have and one on one chat with the brute.
1143.title: Other

11431.content:
How strange were the circumstances surrounding your current situation. The school library claimed that you had failed to return your math book while you remained absolutely adamant that you had proactively returned it before its due date. You would have gladly dealt with the issue with the librarian as it was not uncommon for students to accidentally switch textbooks and turn in each other's textbooks without knowing; you were confident that this is what happened. However, due to some administrative and policy changes your school had gone through in the past year, a lost textbook was automatically treated as a serious offence as it was seen as a disrespect of school property. With this unrelenting zero tolerance policy in place you were unable to plea your case with the librarian and were instead sent straight to the highest disciplinary authority the school had to offer, Mr. Reed. That's how you ended up in your current position, nervously standing outside of his imposing office, waiting for your turn to speak with the brute.

The door flung open with a sudden, swift moment to reveal a trembling boy being ushered along by the firm grasp of one of Mr. Reed's hands as he towered over the lad with a scowl. You remained silent as you saw the boy being lead along until Mr. Reed broke the silence with a stern order, "Wait inside. I'll be back soon." You obeyed and stepped inside his office, taking a seat in one of the two uncomfortable chairs that faced his desk.

You filled the creeping minutes you had to yourself by looking around his office, observing his various medals, awards, and photos, the vast majority were from his time in the military. Judging from the photos, Mr. Reed was an absolute beast with muscles rivaling those of any bodybuilder. Nowadays, he had gained a bit of weight and lost some muscle mass but was still intimidatingly strong as hell. You could only imagine the intimidation he had been capable of whilst still in his prime, he would have been able to stomp out delinquency with a single glance. The remainder of the awards were for the exceedingly good jobs he had apparently done at other schools, gaining the reputation for being able to straighten out the delinquents at even the worst schools within a matter of weeks. And, he wouldn't just make the schools he worked at average but instead transform them into well-oiled machines that cranked out well-disciplined pupils that were seemingly incapable of making small mistakes, like losing their math book.

Speaking about Mr. Reeds seemingly magical abilities to turn around any school he came into contact with, nobody was 100% certain as to what Mr. Reeds tactics were. All that people knew was that he started out by targeting groups, punishing the entire group in private before giving them humiliating public punishments such as making them scrub the walls of the lunchroom clean. After he finished with all of the troublesome groups he would move onto individuals, such as yourself, either giving them private or public punishments. Beyond this, whatever Mr. Reed did behind closed doors remained unknown since, frustratingly, nobody who had experienced the punishment ever spoke of it. Not even teachers knew or if they did they did a great job of keeping it under raps, not that they would care to know. All that administrates and teachers cared about were the results, they couldn't care less about the means.

Naturally, fantastical theories emerged, none of which you considered to be credible. Still, you couldn't help but scratch your head in wonderment at some of the things that had happened after Mr. Reed arrived at your school that almost made you believe some of the theories. Foremost was the fact that after he was done with a particularly troublesome group you'd notice that one or two of the groups members were suddenly missing. What made this stranger was that it only happened to groups that were more on the outskirts of the typical high school hierarchy. This made it harder for the general populous to notice the disappearance of those individuals in the first place and once they did they just assumed that the individuals had simply moved away. You would have accepted this if it just happened once or twice but the reality was that people were disappearing from every 'unpopular' group that had history of causing trouble. Stranger still was the fact that after a group lost a member(s) said group would carry on as if that person(s) hadn't existed, even adopting an attitude like that of a stereotypical perfect student. You pondered as why this could be as you heard heavy footsteps approaching.

Mr. Reed froze for a brief moment as he grasped the handle to his office, slightly leaning towards one side as he relaxed his bowels. A quite hissing sound was audible for a few seconds as Mr. Reed let out a silent but deadly blast, inhaling deeply as he basked in the potent scent of digested meat. To anyone that would have been there to witness this, they would have seen what looked like the vapor from a essential oil diffuser exit the backside of Mr. Reed's jeans and lazily rise upwards with a small, indistinguishable figure barely visible in the mist, only to fade into nothingness.
11431.title: Step inside his office...if you dare

114311.content:
Mr. Reed's sly smile morphed into an intimidating scowl as he violently turned the knob, flinging the door open with furor, and sat down in his office chair with a domineering aurora. He glared at you for a few moments before he finally spoke.

"Do you know why you're here?"

Despite your current situation of being confronted by the most no nonsense man you would probably ever meet in your life, you decided to respond rather informally as it was the last day of school and this brute was standing in the way between you and your summer vacation. "'cause 'parently I can't keep track of a simple book 'n' y'all won't lemme talk to the librarian 'bout it, do I have that right?"

Mr. Reed leaned forwards in his chair, placing his in hands the steeple position with his elbows on the desk, "Oh, is this a joke to you, 873300? Because I'm not laughing. What you've done is a serious disrespect of school property which can and will result in serious disciplinary action being taken. Now, I suggest that you fix that attitude of your's before you make things worse for yourself."

"Dude, it's just a book, there's no need to get so worked up about it. If worse comes to worse I'll buy the school a new one, easy. And, um, why'd'you call me by my student ID number? I have a name you know."

"For your information, 873300, I am well aware that his whole book situation can be resolved in an instant but that's not the point. The point is that you did not treat school property with adequate respect and care, that's why your here. Furthermore, I am aware that you have a name, just like everyone else on the planet, I chose to call all students by their ID numbers since they are my subordinates and therefore are not worthy of being referred to by their names."

"But isn't it easier to memorize names than it is to memorize numbers? And what d'ya mean that that's the reason I'm here? That isn't really a reason, idnit?"

"No," bluntly stated Mr. Reed, now visibly annoyed. He continued his sentence after a brief pause, "It becomes easier to memorize numbers over names once you stop seeing them as people, 873300. You see, I view all of you as a bunch of dumb animals in need of training. That's why you're here, to receive training on how to be a good little flea bag that does what it's told."

"Bruh, what kinda dummy shit you on?" you question in a semi-laugh of disbelief, "How would you even train me? Gonna bust out a clicker and give me a cookie and click the clicker every time I do something right so I associate the clicker with a reward like one of Pavlov's dogs?"

This was the straw that broke the camel's back. Mr. Reed had maintained his composure despite your disrespect long enough. He brought his hands down with gusto, slamming down his palms hard on his desk as he pivoted upwards, bringing himself closer to your still smirking face. "That's it you've just crossed the line, 873300,I'm gonna do to you what I do to the worse of the worse, do you hear me!?" belted Mr. Reed in a resonating voice that was so deep and booming that it resonated in your chest cavity.

"Ooh, I'm so scared," you mocked as you kept up your façade of indifference. In reality, however, you were absolutely shitting yourself. For some strange reason, it hadn't yet clicked in your brain that submitting to Mr. Reed would most likely result in you receiving a lesser punishment, oh well.

Mr. Reed appeared to be rather shocked that you continued to talk back even after his outburst, with a sigh he continued in a passive aggressive manner, "listen, I don't know what you think you're accomplishing by doing this but all you're doing is making things harder for yourself. You are going to be punished for your actions. You will be trained to not repeat your malignant actions. And no, this won't be anything like Pavlov's dogs since they were trained to respond to positive reinforcement whilst you be trained purely by negative reinforcement, more effective in my opinion, I'm sure you can see the results of my work. Lastly, do not think that you will be getting out of this."

"Oh yeah? What's there to stop me from walking straight out of that door? You legally can't lay a finger on me," you triumphantly professed.

"You and I both know that that won't work. You know that any twerp that I decide needs punishing will be punished sooner or later. In your case, it's gonna be sooner since you won't be telling anyone else about what happens in this room," Mr. Reed ominously stated.

You knew what he was saying was true, every single person who tried to ditch when they received a note to come to his office was eventually caught. For crying out loud you distinctly recall seeing him step out and stop traffic to get to a poor soul who had just thought they had mad their escape, he was one of the ones you never saw again. This isn't even to mention the fact that nobody ever spoke of what when on behind his office doors, whatever he did/was going to do to you would be so horrid that you would never speak of it again.

"Well, flea bag, are you gonna make my job easy or not?" said Mr. Reed with sudden informality, breaking you out of your trance, "I've been sent here to correct the problems and you're no exception to this so like it or not you're gonna be straightened out. I have a reputation to uphold after all, been keeping it up since the military you know."
114311.title: Mr. Reed Enters

1143111.content:
"Yup, there's no way you're getting out of this," calmly stated Mr. Reed as he slowly arose from his plush office chair, "You've broken the rules and now need to be punished." He proceeded to slowly stroll towards his office's cabinets where he proceeded to pull out a cup. He started to reach for a second but hesitated for a second as he asked, "Hey, 873300, care for a drink? Trust me, you're gonna need it."

"S-sure," you hesitated, confused by his uncharacteristic actions. Whatever the case was you weren't about to ignore his advise.

You watched in dismay as you discovered that the drink he was pouring was nothing more than plain water, at least it would hydrate you for any incoming physical punishments. Mr. Reed began to speak as he poured the water from a large bottle, "Times like this really bring me back to the good ol' days, back when I was a young man just a little older than you, back when I first enlisted in the army," he paused as he walked back towards the desk and handed you one of the glasses, "I quickly proved myself to be a useful asset thanks to my outstanding performance in, well, everything. That's why I was selected to pioneer a new program that would soon turn me into that handsome lad you see up there," he said as he gestured towards one of the photos you had been looking at.

"So...was this like a Captain America kind of experiment?" you commented as you stared at the photo, "making super soldiers and stuff?"

"Not exactly," replied Mr. Reed after taking a swig from his cup, "It was more of a happy accident that I ended up that way. The actual purpose of the program was to find new ways of dealing with and disposing of captured spies and other enemies, which we did."

"Wow, that's pretty interesting," you said with only partial interest, "surprised that you're allowed to tell me this. Seems like such an effective method would should be keep secret."

"Oh, it will remain secret. Would you like to hear more about it while we finish our drinks?" replied Mr. Reed in an off-putting tone.

You realized that it would be better to let Mr. Reed continue his walk down memory lane as it seemed to put him in a good mood. Plus, it would just be awkward silence otherwise. "Sure, I'm game."

"Great! So, after a few months of testing the heads of the program decided that enough data had been collected and rolled out the new method to all branches of the arm forces. By this time, however, the war broke out which meant that we had a flood of new recruits. As a result, my time involved with the program and the new method came to a halt as I was given the role of drill sergeant and sent off to train the new recruits. Or so I though, you see some of the recruits that we were getting were...well....absolutely pathetic. There was no way in hell anyone could make a man out of those wastes of oxygen no matter how hard they tried. That was when I realized that there was a solution to this problem, the new method. I realized that we could set up a system that would identify those who wouldn't amount to anything early on so they could be taken care of so that no energy would be wasted on trying to train them."

"Whoa whoa whoa, you're telling me that you offed them?!" you exclaimed as you became more interested in the story as it posed more questions than it answered, "and what the heck is the new method in the first place? How did it make you into an absolute powerhouse? What the heck's even going on?!"

"To answer your first question, yes we 'offed' them," before he could continue answering your questions, you cut him off.

"HWAT," you explained, "that's all kinds of fucked."

"Eh, it was for the greater good"

"THE GREATER GOOD!? YOU KILLED THEM!"

"Yeah, but their lives were worthless anyways. We just wrote of their deaths as some heroic last stand in battle or somethin'. That way their families would rest easy thinking that their loved ones died in a triumphant last stand instead of never making it out of basic training," coolly responded Mr. Reed.

You, on the other hand, couldn't believe what you were hearing. Was what he was saying even true? And is it was then why was he telling you this? You remained silent as you pondered, unable to will yourself to keep up your facade.

"As for your second and third questions, they have the same answer. You see, the new method involves shrinking the subject down to around the size of an action figure, this could one of two ways. Either the subject was tortured in order to extract information and then disposed of or the subject was just disposed of."

"T-that doesn't answer my third question, though," you retorted, still unsure if what he was saying was true. You wanted to believe that he was lying but on the other hand, Mr. Reed was the most no nonsense person on the planet. There was no way that he would lie about anything, was there?

"I was getting to that before you rudely interrupted me. Anyways, after discussing various methods of disposal from cremation to burial we finally found the most effective way, to dissolve the body in acid. That way there would be no leftover evidence such as ash and bone, the only problem with this was that acid is difficult to handle and store. That's when one of the head scientists came up with a theory: what if the acid used was stomach acid? Sounds crazy, I know, but the crazier thing was that it worked...well sort of. Turns out that only certain types of people's guts can completely break down and destroy another human being, that certain type of people being what that scientists called SM, or superior males, which the army just so happens to have an abundance of. Turns out that, according to his research, there exists a subset of the male population that is superior to all other humans in size, strength, and intelligence. And, it just so happens that you're looking at one of those males," boasted Mr. Reed.

"D-does that mean..." you meekly stated, sill in utter disbelief in what your ears had just heard. You weren't even 100% sure that you had even heard any of what Mr. Reed said correctly.

"That's right, I was personally responsible for the disposal of hundreds of spies, enemies, and worthless recruits. That's why I was able to get so strong since, as it turns out, humans are perfect muscle fuel for us SMs," proudly stated Mr. Reed as if it were a perfectly natural thing to be proud of. "Of course the effects only last when there's a steady stream and when you make sure to get plenty of exercise when there is a steady stream, or else you end up like me," he let out a small, hearty laugh as he grabbed and shook his stomach.

"Wait, what do you mean or else you'll end up like me? That doesn't make since, you would've been getting plenty of exercise whilst in the military. Unless..."

"You're certainly right about that! But, like all good things, my time in the army soon came to an end and I was honorably discharged. Afterwards, I decided to use the skills I had gained as a drill sergeant for bettering problem schools but, without my secret weapon, I didn't have much success. That was until, by pure chance, I ran into one of the scientist who had worked on the project."

You had a hard time believing that Mr. Reed would ever have any problems dealing with problem teens but, then again, before he told you about the secret program you were being extremely defiant. Anyways, a light bulb just went off in your head, one you wished wouldn't have gone off. "No...it can't be. You're lying, aren't you?"

"Oh, am I? Well, you're about to find out. How was that drink, by the way?" evilly smirked Mr. Reed.

"Wait, wha-" before you could finished your sentence you suddenly felt an intense pain and doubled over.

"Yup, since staring my new job I have't had much time to workout. I guess I could go to the gym early before work like your math teacher does but I think that too much work. Anyways, I'm still strong as hell and that's all that matters," Mr. Reed indifferently stated as you were busy writhing in pain. It soon got to the point where you couldn't take it and blacked out.
1143111.title: Mr. Reed straightens you out

11431111.content:
Your vision was momentarily blurred as you slowly began to regain conscious, your head pounding as you fought to remain awake. For a moment you couldn't remember where you were or how you got there as your eyes came to focus on the high ceiling of the room you were in. You tried to sit up but it was proving to be difficult as your hands sank into the surface that you were lying on, not to mention that your whole body still ached. By the time you managed to fully sit up, you realized that something wasn't quite right.

"A-am I hella smol or is er'thing hella big? Prolly jus' a wack dream," you wondered aloud as you tried to make sense of your surroundings which seemed to be a gargantuan office. You tried hard to remember the events that led up to you waking up on what appeared to be a giant office chair but, despite your best efforts, you couldn't remember which seemed to confirm your suspicion that this was all just a wild dream. At least it seemed to until you started to inspect your surrounding closer; it all seemed so real...too real. Just then, you heard the thunderous sound of footsteps making their way towards you. You really hoped it was all just a dream then.

Mr. Reed sat reclined in his plush office chair, pleased to see you shrink down to the size of an action figure. He sat eagerly counting the minutes until you'd awake as most tended to lose consciousness when they ingested the serum for about the same length of time. He had to resist the urge to take care of you sooner, but he knew that there was no fun in doing it while you were unconscious. His diligent waiting came to an end when he heard your puny voice originating from the chair you had been sitting at.

Suddenly, a massive figure obscured your view, casting you into an imposing shadow which entrapped you in it's impermeable darkness. Before your eyes had the chance to adjust, you heard a massive booming voice from above.

"Hahaha, still think I'm lying, boy?"

You couldn't believe it. In front of you stood Mr. Reed...except that this wasn't normal Mr. Reed. The Mr. Reed that stood before you was as tall as skyscraper from your perspective. "This is a dream, it just has to. That's the only logical explanation to this, unless...unless...oh god." Seeing Mr. Reed stand before you was all you needed to remember the exchange you had just had with the brute. The thought of him telling the truth was too much for you, you simply couldn't accept it.

"God, I love it when they figure it out, when they figure out that there's no escape from their fate. Now, you're about to see just how real this is," uttered Mr. Reed as his massive hand descended towards you, restraining you in his powerful grasp. You were trapped and there was absolutely nothing that you could do about it. This, however didn't stop you from struggling.

"W-wha! Let me go! Y-you can't do this!" you exclaimed in desperation as Mr. Reed slowly and steadily brought you up to his face.

"Oh I can, and I will. And guess what, little toy, there's nothing you can do to stop me so beg and scream all you want. It brings me pleasure anyways."

Just then, a burst of loud static came from Mr. Reed's walkie-talkie followed by a distorted voice, "Main office to Reed, main office to Reed. Come in Reed." Mr. Reed instinctively reached for the device and pressed the button on the side in order to reply. As soon as he did you began to yell at the top of your lungs, "Help! He's shrunken me and is going to fucking kill me! Fuckin' send send for the love of god, I don't want to die." Instead of hearing another voice answer your pleas you were only greeted by silence. It was then that you realized that Mr. Reed had only pressed down the button for half a second, none of your pleas were heard.

"Nice try but we can't have you spoiling all the fun, now lets shut you up for a bit," as soon as Mr. Reed finished his sentence he lifted up his opposite arm and began swiftly moving you towards his armpit.

"Wait, what're you doing? What're you doing?! Fucking STOP! No, no, no, no, Mph!!" you screamed whilst beings shoved into Mr. Reed's armpit. This wouldn't be so bad since he always wore sleeved dress shirts however, you came to find that the fabric surrounding Mr. Reed's pits were soaked in sweat. Just when you though things couldn't get any worse Mr. Reed slammed down his arm, firmly pinning you against the sweat soaked fabric as he finished his call.

You tried your best to struggle but found it impossible not only due to the pressure but also do to the stickiness of the fabric, entrapping you the rank, sour-smelling aroma of Mr. Reed's pit sweat. You remained trapped for what felt like centuries as Mr. Reed finished talking to whomever was on the other end. Just when you began to feel like you would die from the humidity within the armpit, you were suddenly blasted by a wave of fresh air and rescued by a familiar hand.

"Right, listen up, 873300. School's about to get out and they need me to patrol the campus to insure that nobody decides to pull any end of year pranks."

"Does that mean I;m free to go since you can't do anything to me once school's out?"

"Hell no, you're not in the school's hands anymore. You're in mine, and I don't let the little things like jurisdiction get in my way of serving up some fair punishment. Now, what's gonna happen is that you're gonna be joining me on my patrol."

"W-what? What'd'you mean? How'm I s'posed to do that?"

"You'll see, now let's get going, the bell's going to ring any minute now."
11431111.title: You come to, shrunk

114311111.content:
With that said, Mr. Reed tightened his grip on you before he spoke, "Now, don't try any funny business on our way there, got it?"

"Funny business you say, hmm, like me screaming for help, causing you to be caught red-handed and me to be set free? WhY WoUlD i EvEr Do ThAt?" you taunted in a sarcastic tone, "And, how're you gonna 'splain away you holding an action figure sized me?"

"I don't plan of getting caught, that's how I explain this whole situation away. You forget yourself, 873300, you forget that I can easily crush you like an empty soda can. Now, that won't happen unless you decide to open that little mouth of yours while we're around other people," confidently stated Mr. Reed.

"Hmm, I see. Still, how're you gonna carry me around without people taking notice? I don't see you getting around that one, chief."

"Like this," bluntly stated Mr. Reed before shoving you into one of his pant's pockets, making sure to keep a firm grip on you as he began to exit his office.

"I see..." you responded.

Despite still having Mr. Reed's firm hand encasing you within it's iron grip, you were still able to feel the rhythmic movements made by his powerful quads as he walked onward towards your destination. Your whole body was being forcefully compressed with the motion as the fabric of his pants tightened and loosened with each one of his strides. To make things worse the heat from within the pocket caused Mr. Reed's hand to start sweating, causing you to become coated in a thick layer of disgusting hand sweat. At first you tried to use this to your advantage as you thought it would serve as a natural lubricant that would aid your escape, screw whatever he said about crushing you. You couldn't be more wrong. In reality, Mr. Reed's sweat further entrapped you as its consistency was extraordinarily slimy and sticky, serving as a binding agent that further adhered you to Mr. Reed's gargantuan hand.

As the walk drew on, you began to smell a pungent, musky smell that slowly permeated its way into your nostrils. It seemed oddly familiar, as if you'd smelled a lighter version a couple times before, typically in certain places in the locker room or when you stripped off all your clothes before a shower. But why would you be smelling a much stronger version of that smell now? It took you a minute before it finally clicked, that smell was none other than Mr. Reed's crotch musk. It was so strong that it managed to find its way to where you were in his front pants pocket. You groaned in disgust as the thick musty odor of a real man's nether regions violated your nostrils, magnified by the hot and humid conditions within the pocket. You felt like you were on the brink of vomiting when you were suddenly yanked upwards as Mr. Reed sat down in one swift motion.

"Here we are, 873300, where you'll be getting your last glimpses at the outside world."

Your eyes slowly came into focus as you recovered from the wave of nausea which had just hit you like a truck do to a combination of the smell and the sudden roller coaster- like movements you had just experienced. "Hwa, hwhat d'you mean," you stumbled out between gasps as you began to look upon your surroundings. You where inside one of the many electric carts which your school used to patrol the campus as well as to transport supplies between buildings. Beyond that your campus' quad slowly came into focus, soon to be filled with swarms of highschoolers, eager to start their summer break.

After a few more moments you were finally recovered enough to give a proper response, "Dude, ya needs to fix y'allz swap crotch. That shit's so rank I don't even have words to describe it."

"I suppose that's what happens when you have so much packed into such a confined space, starts to get pretty swampy from the heat. Sorry that you aren't capable of handling such manly aromas, 873300 but fret not, I wouldn't dream of putting you anywhere closer to there than you've already been."

"Wow, how merciful of you."

"Don't be getting the wrong idea now, it's not for your sake that I'm not gonna grind you into my crotch."

"Worried that I'll report ya for sexual misconduct if you do?" you jousted, "'cuz it doesn't seem like you've given a shit 'bout anything else you've done."

"You're correct, I don't care about anything I've done or plan to do to you. The reason I won't bring you any closer to my nether regions is because I would never grant such a worthless piece of shit the honor of touching what a superior man holds."

"Bruh, why ya gotta be like that tho, I ain't worthless."

"Oh but I do believe that you are mistaken, 873300, you're worthless in every sense of the word," before he could finish his statement the final bell gave out it's fateful ring as hordes of students poured out out of the buildings. "Looks like it's go time, 873300, now time to hide you in plain sight."

"How're ya gonna do that?"

"By putting you where a worthless piece of shit belongs." Before you could respond Mr. Reed leaned towards one side whilst plummeting you downwards towards the seat of the cart, to where one of his plump ass cheeks had just been sitting. In a blink of an eye he let go of you whilst slamming down his elevated cheek, trapping you underneath his entire weight. Despite this, he insured that your head was still sticking out, allowing you a view of whatever he drove past. "There we go, now you won't be going anywhere while still being able to see many of your classmates enjoying their freedom, the very same freedom that you'll never get to experience again. Best of all, nobody will even notice you're there and if they do they'll probably think that you're an action figure I accidentally sat on."

You tried your best to reply to what Mr. Reed had just said but found it impossible as you could barely get enough air to remain conscious into your compressed lungs let alone enough to speak. You felt as if every single bone in your body was about to snap underneath the his gargantuan weight, they probably would have been if it weren't for the cart's cushioned seat and the blubberiness of his ass. There was no escaping this, you simply had to wait for Mr. Reed to finish yelling at misbehaving students as he drove past them. You're only objective at the moment was to survive the whole ordeal.

After several minutes of riding around, whilst Mr. Reed was stopped to scold a random student, you spotted something out of the corner of your eye. This something wasn't just a something but a someone, and not just a someone but a group of someones. It was your friends, the only people who were close enough and willing enough to help and all you had to do was get their attention. Without wasting a second you began to call out to them, "h-hey~ Help...me....please." Try as you might you weren't able to produce more than just a barely audible whisper. Soon enough, they started to walk away. "No...please...don't....go....come....back," you desperately pleaded as tears began to stream down your face, your only pass to freedom gone. Mr. Reed certainly took note.

"Trying to get your friends to help I see. Don't bother, even if they could hear your pathetic pleas they wouldn't come to your aid. You know why, 873300?" You knew full well that Mr. Reeds was fully aware that you were incapable of answering and was only asking questions to spite you. "Well I'll tell you, it's because they don't see you as their equal. They see you as that one annoying kid who's only in the group because they were once close friends to one of the group's members and is only allowed to stay because he provides amusement from time to time and because they can't be bothered to get rid of you. In other words, they're only your friends because they pity you, because they know that without them you'd be all alone."

You desperately wanted to refute what he was saying but, alas, you were unable to. "You might not want to admit it but that's the cold hard truth and you know it. I've seen they way you act around them and the way the act around you. They try to ignore you and to push you away but you desperately cling on, trying to things they'll like such as talking like a hoodlum the same way you've been talking to me. You're nothing but a worthless piece of shit desperately trying to fit in but hopelessly failing."

If you weren't balling your eyes out already you certainly were now as you continued to take his ruthless barrage as he began to drive back towards the office. "That's not the only reason you're worthless, 873300, there's plenty more but I'll only give you the major ones. You're useless at math, the most important subject, you're weak, you're socially awkward, you can't play any sports, and you barely make an impact in anyone's life, hell I'm sure it won't be for a couple of weeks until somebody questions your disappearance. You deserve to be under my ass, 873300, that's the only place where a runt like you deserves to be other than dead. The only thing you're actually decent at is English, one of the most useless things to excel at. I mean, what would you have done later on in life, become an English major and later go on to be a starving author? Come on. You know very well that the only things worth pursuing in life are STEM related, all things which you just happen to be useless at. You literally would have amounted to nothing, 873300."

Mr. Reed's barrage ended as you pulled up to the school's office. You heard a loud rumbling coming from above as he put the cart in park and removed the keys. "Damn, I was hoping to save this for later but now's a good a time as ever. Here's a little preview of what you're whole worlds gonna be pretty soon, 873300." With that Mr. Reed leaned over to one side and released a massive, deep, brassy, hurricane-like fart onto your shrunken body. "Ah~ that hit the spot," said Mr. Reed while inhaling deeply, "that's a smell I've grown to absolutely love over the years. The smell of what a superior male can do."
114311111.title: Continue

1143111111.content:
Once Mr. Reed had finished relishing in what his superior body was capable of producing he promptly exited the cart before grabbing you in his fierce grip, slowly carrying you towards the imposing building. You were completely stunned from the intensity of the blast, so much so that you were incapable of continuing your remarks or even of protesting. You lay perfectly still within Mr. Reed's grip, your brain seemingly stuck on a loading screen which only reached 100% once Mr. Reed broke the ominous silence which had fallen.

"Here we are, 873300, the place where you'll spend the last fleeting moments left of your worthless life," said Mr. Reed as he reached for the doorknob of a room you had never entered before.

It took you a second to realize that the room you were about to be carried off into was the detention room. You had only ever passed the room from the outside, never paying much attention as you had never gotten into enough trouble to warrant a trip. But now you were about to enter the infamous room for what was seemingly the first and last time. With a faithful push the door to the room flung open, and Mr. Reed stepped beyond the curtain of darkness which divided the dark room from the brightly lit hallway.

For a few seconds all you could see was a sea of darkness, stretching everforth into oblivion, ready to swallow you up. Suddenly, all of the room’s harsh fluorescent lights simultaneously ignited, burning your eyes in the process. As your eyes slowly adjusted you came to find that the room you were in was no different than your average classroom save a few notable exceptions.

Rows of desks were neatly arranged in an orderly manner, all set facing the room’s only whiteboard which had the words, “Detention, no talking, no phones, no food, no drink,” written on it in bold black ink. Directly in front of the white board sat a solitary desk set facing the rest of the room, the supervisor’s desk you presumed. Besides this the room was rather barren when compared to your average classroom. No posters or work adorned the walls, no pens or paper where visible, no books to speak of, and not a single window to give occupants a glimpse of the outside world or to let in a breeze of fresh air. You even took note of the intense silence which permeated the room, not even the idle sound of the air conditioning could be heard as the room had a notable lack of vents, allowing for any sound made to be heard. This had an adverse effect of giving the room a rather stuffy atmosphere which seemed to slowly asphyxiate any inhabitants. The overall atmosphere of the room seemed to be akin to that of a sensory deprivation chamber or the solitary confinement of a prison. Something told you that this was intentional. You felt that any poor soul who was forced to spend hours upon hours would eventually, inevitably lose at least a small part of their sanity.

With a sudden lurch forwards, you were snapped out of your trance as Mr. Reed carried you towards the front row of desks before setting you down on the desk which was directly across from the supervisor’s. He proceeded to sit down at the supervisor’s desk, without saying a word, and stared at you for what felt like an eternity before he finally broke the silence.

“So, what do you think, 873300? I designed the layout of this room myself, it’s perfect, isn't it? I would have changed a few more things but this was the most I was able to get away with.”

“It’s very…ummm…plain if I’m being honest. I mean, what the heck are people supposed to do when they’re in here?” you responded with a growing tinge of hesitancy, your speech slowly becoming less informal as a result of you gradually not being able to keep up the façad of calmness you had been projecting.

“Suffer, that’s what. They’re supposed to sit in absolute silence and reflect on what they’ve done to end up in there until they’ve learned their lesson. If everything goes according to plan then they will have suffered so much from a lack of any sort of stimulation that they’ll never want to break any rules ever again.”

“K then, I’m not sure that there are other ways to deal with misbehaving students that are more humane but, whatever gets the job done I guess.”

“There are other ways but what’s the point if you don’t get to see them suffer. There’s no fun in that! That’s the whole point of this desk is facing the rest of the room,” says Mr. Reed while gesturing towards his desk, “it’s so I can watch as, one by one, their spirits break as the hours tick by. As their futile struggles to keep themselves entertained inevitably fail as they succumb to the extreme boredom of not even being able to do menial schoolwork. I’d have to say that it’s my third favorite thing to do in this room.”

You couldn’t help yourself as your curiosity got the better of you, “I know I’m going to regret this, but what’s your second favorite and favorite thing to do?”

“I’m glad you asked, 873300, my second favorite thing to do is this,” Mr. Reed’s was ominously followed by silence as if he had spontaneously forgotten what he was talking about.

“What?” you questioned moments before discovering what Mr. Reed was referring to, “Oh my God! It smells like something fucking died,” you exclaimed as you tightly held your nose.

“Yup, it’s always fun to see everyone’s reactions as they get a whiff of one of my silent but deadly blasts. What makes it even better is watching them try to contain their cries as any sort of outburst would result in additional punishment. Plus, to top it off, since there’s no ventilation in this room the odors from my emissions linger and worsen over time until I open the door at the end of the detention period. Until then, everyone’s forced to breathe in air which is gradually composed more and more of my toxic emissions.”

“W-why tho??” you questioned whilst still choking on the horrid stench.

“Two reasons: One, it’s fun to watch the suffering of others, especially if I was the one to cause it. Two, it’s the natural result of my favorite thing to do in this room.”

“Which is…”

“Destroying worthless wastes of oxygen,” said Mr. Reed with a sinister smirk as you stared at him in wide-eyed disbelief, “yup, this is where all of this school’s undesirables meet their end. In fact, that young lad you saw with me earlier meet his doom right here,” he said while quickly scooping you up to take you to another row where he then pointed to a spot on the ground, “That’s where he fell after shrinking. Since I didn’t want to keep you waiting, I decided to skip the fanfare and just swallow him like a pill before he woke up. He did end up waking up when he reached my gut though. Ha ha, he struggled quite a bit when I burped up the remainder of his air before I made my way back to my office. Of course that struggle was rather short lived as he croaked before I reached my office, I hope you do better than that.”

“HWAT! You can’t possibly be serious!”

“You can’t possibly mean that you still don’t believe me, 873300?”

“After what I’ve seen, what I’ve experienced, I guess I do partially believe you but still...why? I know you’ve given your reasons but I still can’t accept them.”

“To be frank, I don’t give a damn if you accept my reasons or not. All that matters is that I’m doing the world a favor by ridding it of another worthless waste of oxygen. You seem like a somewhat observant fellow, 873300, I’m sure that you’ve noticed people disappearing around campus.”

“Yeah”

“I’m sure that you’ve come to realize what has happened to all of them.” You slowly knod in confirmation. “Now, do you wonder why I chose to eliminate those individuals in particular when I’ve left worse trouble makers with nothing worse than a slap on the wrist?”

“I guess...you’re gonna tell me anyways, aren’t you?”

“Correct, the reason behind this is that the ones I let go actually have value while the ones I eliminate don’t. Sure, they might not be the smartest but they sure are the manliest. They assert their dominance by degrading the weak and by partaking in athletics, not to mention that they’re also extremely popular. Those are men that are going places, taking what they want and asserting themselves above others. As for the ones I eliminate, they’re the exact opposite. In fact, they’re often the individuals that are tormented by the others.”

“That’s messed up in all kinds of ways.”

“Eh, at least I put them out of their misery, not that they deserve that. Anyways, it’s about time for you to receive your punishment,” with that Mr. Reed took you in his grasp and walked you to the supervisor’s desk where he set you down before taking a seat. From this point of view Mr. Reed seemed to be like some sort of god, towering over you like a mountain. You simply looked up in silence. “Alright, let’s get this trial started.”

“Trial?” you questioned. “Like I’m going to be judged and sentenced? So there’s a chance that I can walk free?”

“Well I’m the judge, jury, and executioner so if you want to convince yourself that there’s a chance you’ll get out of this then be my guest.”

“Fuck”

“Anyways, I call this court to session.”
1143111111.title: You Enter The Office

11431111111.content:
“You can’t possibly expect me to play along with this whole trial sharad, can you? The hecks even the point of doing this?”

“Watch your tongue, 873300, or you might just be handed a harsher sentence. As for why I go through the formality of having a trial for the accused, it started as necessary formality needed for legal reasons back in my military days. Its stuck around until now simply because I enjoy the thrill one gets when they sentence another being to die.”

“Just...Just get the damn thing over with,” you said, not wanting to comment on his sadicity of his response.

Without further ado, Mr. Reed proceeded to read out your charges in an authoritative manner, “873300, you stand accused of the high crimes of the disrespect and mishandling of school property, disrespecting school faculty, and being an absolute failure.”

“And what?! How the heck is that a crime and, more importantly, how do you even judge that?!”

“SILENCE, I shall not be interrupted!” burst Mr. Reed as you quickly back off to let him continue, “As I was saying, you have failed at athletics, social life, and your most important subjects. This translates to you being an overall failure in life and people who fail in life don’t deserve to be alive at all. So, how do you plead?”

“Not guilty, bitch,” you weren’t sure as to why you continued to be so brash with Mr. Reed. Maybe it was due to the fact that a miniscule part of you still clung onto the belief that Mr. Reed was lying. Or maybe it was due to, if he wasn’t lying, there was nothing you could say or do to make things any worse for yourself.
“Tough luck, the jury finds you guilty of all crimes and sentences you to death,” chirps Mr. Reed with a sinister smile sprawled across his face.

“Bruh, I ain’t even get to defend myself.”

“Nothing you could have said or done would have changed the outcome,” bluntly stated Mr. Reed as he quickly scooped you up in his right hand, “Now's time for the fun stuff, for me at least. haha”

It suddenly dawned on you, that minuscule shred of hope that you so desperately had clung onto had broken. Your short, teenage life was about to tragically be cut short. You began to struggle and squirm like a fish out of water struggling for its life. Unfortunately for you, you would soon end up just like a fish out of water, dead.

“Struggle all you want but it isn’t going to help you out in the slightest. In fact, all you’re going to end up doing is getting me excited,” said Mr. Reed as he felt his pants start to tent, “god I love it when they struggle”

“LET ME GO, YOU CAN’T DO THIS TO ME!!! I’ll do anything else you want me to do, just please,” you desperately plead as you begin to sob, “p-please…”

“Oh I can and I will, just watch me. There’s nothing you can do to stop what’s about to happen to you, 873300, just be glad that I’ve saved you from living out the rest of your miserable life.”

Mr. Reed, in one swift motion, greedily shoved you head first into his gaping maw. You desperately tried to protest but your pleas were drowned out by you receiving a face full of tongue. Mr. Reed carefully licked your whole body, making sure to cover every square inch of you in a thick layer of his saliva. A quiet moan escaped past you as he savored your flavors and, more importantly, savored the feeling of putting another pipsqueak where he belongs. He couldn’t help himself, his twisted ideas of purifying mankind by ridding it of inferior beings got him harder than anything else could, he unzipped his pants and got to work.

Once all of your flavor was gone, he reached up with one hand while the other remained dutifully at work in order to get the your execution started. With one small thrust your head was forcefully shoved into the back of his throat, causing his powerful throat muscles to lock you in. From then on out the rest of the process was hands free as his throat muscles, conditioned from years of practice, easily sucked you down towards your doom. This was despite your continued struggles as you clawed at the insides of the demonic slip ‘n’ slide that you were being forced to ride. Soon enough, your head was being forced against the closed entrance to Mr. Reed’s hungry stomach. As Mr. Reed’s throat muscles continued to force the rest of you down, your head popped through the opening, soon joined by the remainder of your slimy body. Naturally, you began to claw at the walls of the stomach along as the entryway that had just closed behind you. Your efforts were fruitless. You began to scream out of desperation.

“Please! For the love of all that’s good in the world LET ME OUT! I Promise I’ll change, I’ll turn my whole life around. Please, I don’t want to die. I don’t want to die!”

Unfortunately, your pleas were being drowned by the rhythmic sound of Mr. Reed pleasuring himself to your demise. In fact, the only thing that your fruitless struggles were accomplishing were providing your tormentor with more stimulation. “That’s right, bitch, keep on struggling. The only thing you’re accomplishing is encouraging my stomach to churn you,” cooed Mr. Reed between moans.

He wasn’t wrong since, as soon as he finished saying that, acid began to flood his stomach. This drove you into an even wilder panic as you felt an intense burning all over your body, this isn’t even to mention the foul odor. The burning was by far the worst pain you had experienced in your life, it felt thousands of times worse than what you thought a bullet ant bite would be. This was worsened by the fact that his powerful stomach wall had begun to process of churning you into sludge. As if things couldn’t get any worse, you were suddenly vacuumed sealed as Mr. Reed burped up all of your air.

With a single foul, explosive belch Mr. Reed robbed you of the last thing keeping you alive. You would soon black out from a lack of oxygen but not before squirming and struggling like you never had before. This was exactly what he wanted, what he needed to push him over the edge.

“Y-yeah, that’s right...squirm like the worm you are...get churned into the shit you deserve to be...ugh...ugh...AHUGH!” exclaimed Mr. Reed as he blew his load all over the very desk you had been tried at.
11431111111.title: Court is in Session

114311111111.content:
“Woo, that was the best one in a while,” said Mr. Reed as he admired his work for a quick minute, “Now, before you croak, there’s a couple of things I want to make sure you hear. For starters, I hear from one of your teachers that you’re quite the environmentalist snowflake who cares deeply about reducing our greenhouse gas emissions. Now, I hate to break this to you, but the way a Superior Male’s digestive system works causes us to produce extreme amounts of methane gas from the foods we eat, especially from meat. And, for whatever reason, former person causes us to produce the most methane out of any other type of food, just one of the many interesting things I found out while the project was still in its experimental phase. Anyways, the point is that I’m going to churn you mostly into something you hate and there’s nothing you can do to stop me. How does it feel knowing that the vast majority of your being is going to contribute to the destruction of the planet? To something you had so admirably been against? But I don’t just have bad news for you, there is a silver lining after all! The rest of your body, the parts what won’t become shit anyways, will be absorbed by my body as I ride home in my classic muscle car. Think about it 873300, part of you is going on to become part of something greater, something greater than you could ever be. You could go on to become a drop of my sweat or to contribute to replenishing the seed I just lost, the possibilities are almost endless!”

By this point you were mere seconds from losing consciousness, using your last ounce strength you mouthed the words, “fuck you.” That would go on to be the last thing you would do in the world besides a couple of involuntary twitches when your body finally succumbed to asphyxiation.

“Oh, and before I forget, due to your outburst in court I’ve decided that you’ll be receiving additional punishment.” Mr. Reed’s comment was heard by no one as you had already given your last breath, leaving your body to be slowly churned into a formless sludge that would go onto his small intestine to start the absorption process. It was at this point that you puny soul broke free of its earthly bonds and began to search for a way out. Mr. Reed had gone through the process so many times that he became an expert on detecting the presence of the little guy bumping around.

“Ah, I see you’re finally done,” gleefully said Mr. Reed, “Looking for the way to the afterlife I see. Well, that’s actually what I wanted to talk to you about before you so rudely crapped out on me,” he gave pauses as if waiting for a response. He knew that if there was one it would most likely be in the form as a slurry of insults but that didn’t matter to him. “So what usually happens at this point is that I’ll either burp or fart you out depending on how far in you’re in and what I feel like doing. If I have the choice I’ll typically fart out the ones with major infractions in order to give them the added punishment and humiliation of having to pass through my funky bare ass while I burp out the ones with minor infractions. However, there is a third option which is the one I’m going with for you. That option is to never let you out, to keep you suffering inside of me for all of eternity, to keep you churning away. A fate worse than eternal damnation. This is your additional punishment for speaking out during the trail. You know what, 873300, I’m probably doing everyone a favor by making my gut your afterlife, I can’t think of a more unworthy person to experience the afterlife than you. It was probably starting to crowded up there anyways, best to keep the space meant for you open to somebody more worthy of it.”

With that, Mr. Reed went home for the day, leaving you to finish digesting whilst he went along as if nothing had happened.
114311111111.title: Continuation

1143111111111.content:
